extension.description: PSMC's Maintenance does many maintenance functions to aid with a much smoother PSMC experience without all the fluff. Features include: Auto delete of cache at start up, notifies when packages and thumbs reach a set amount of wasted storage space (you can set and change sizes), cuts down on your devices read/writes on the ROM. Also has Backup/Restore Options, Speed test, and other features!![CR][CR]If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please scan the "Coffee Cup" (QC code) above and buy me a cup of coffee or subscribe for access to "What's Next" and all future updates. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] â€¢ The Papaw[/COLOR]

This addon allows you to stream or download video files that are already transfered into your Real-Debrid account! The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.[CR][CR]If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please scan the "Coffee Cup" (QC code) above and buy me a cup of coffee or subscribe for access to "What's Next" and all future updates. extension.summary: The Official Repo for PSMC-20 (Papaw's Son Media Center)
extension.description: This is the "Official" repository for PSMC-20 (Papaw's Son Media Center). PSMC-20 is a fork of Kodi.[CR]- [COLOR orange]Please consider supporting our efforts with a [B][COLOR deepskyblue]cup of coffee[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code![/COLOR]

extension.summary: Launches LaunchBox in Big Box mode from within PSMC.
extension.disclaimer: For bugs, requests or general questions visit the PSMC-20 Repository on GitHub.
extension.description: Launches Big Box from within PSMC - It will close or minimize PSMC and when Big Box is exited, PSMC will restart or maximize. Also has options to run programs pre or post BigBox. It works with PSMC or Kodi on Windows platform ONLY.[CR][CR]If you would like to show your appreciation for the time and efforts I put into these projects, please scan the "Coffee Cup" (QC code) above and buy me a cup of coffee or subscribe for access to "What's Next" and all future updates. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] â€¢ The Papaw[/COLOR]

extension.description: Papaw's AZR Redux is gebaseerd op de originele Arctic Zephyr-skin gemaakt door jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux gaat over simpel, strak, minimalistisch en uiterst aanpasbaar.[CR][CR]Overweeg alstublieft om onze inspanningen te ondersteunen met een [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"kopje koffie"[/COLOR][/B] door de QR te scannen code hieronder of ga naar [COLOR deepskyblue]https://bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [COLOR limoengroen] (Vrijgevigheid zoals die van jou is tegenwoordig zeldzaam. Ik dank je bij voorbaat voor je steun. Ik ben erg dankbaar voor je donatie en waardeer je vriendelijkheid enorm!)[/COLOR][COLOR hemelsblauw] • De Papaja[/COLOR]

Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.[CR][CR]Please consider supporting our efforts with a [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"cup of coffee"[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code below or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]https://bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]
